title: [FEATURE] Add Getting Started to Readme.md
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I am just starting with using SkiaSharp and the first thing I noticed was it wasn't obvious as to where to go to get started.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Could we add a "Getting Started" to the readme.md?  it could be something like:

### Getting Started
[Introduction to SkiaSharp](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/xamarin/graphics-games/skiasharp/introduction)
#### Tutorials
[Xamarin Forms](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/xamarin/deep-dive-skiasharp-xamarin-forms/)
[WPF]
etc...
#### Api Docs
[Skia Api](https://skia.org/)

It would be something to help users find resources for using SkiaSharp and link them to the docs and api.  I'd be happy to collaborate on this and help out.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Alternatives could be to just leave the readme as it is.  There are plenty of resources out there, but I think it'd might be nice to categorize/centralize the resources for getting started.

**Additional context**
NA
